data.name: Warwick EngSoc Takes Neon
data.description:
DON’T MISS OUT! ⚠️ Join us the first social of the year at Neon! 

Click the link: https://fixr.co/event/551965303 when tickets go live on Sep 27 at 12pm✅

Join us in Leamington Spa at 8:30pm for our first bar crawl and club event of the year! 🌟 We’ll begin at Old Library pub (8:30pm), followed by TJ’s Bar (9:00pm), Kelsey’s (9:30pm) and Fifteen (10:00pm). The crawl will conclude at one of the most popular clubs, Neon (11:00pm), for a traditional Warwick student Friday night out! 

Come explore the night life in leamington and meet new people along the way. 

Alternatively, you can meet our social sec Phoebe at the campus bus stop to travel with her to Leamington. Anyone else can also join us at 11pm by Neon. Hope to see you there!

data.name: Warwick Engineering Society Autumn BBQ
data.description: Join us for an amazing BBQ in the sun! Drop in and bring all your friends for a great time with Warwick Engineering Society on Sunday to recover from a week of partying. Veggie and vegan options available. Time: 12:00-14:00. Location: Arthur Vick Gardens *behind AV3

data.name: Warwick Engineering Society Pub Quiz Night
data.description: Join us for an amazing pub quiz on Saturday night before you hit the clubs, bars and pubs! Bring all your friends and meet at Varsity at 19:00 for an epic quiz including geography, music, pop culture and of course engineering.
